member.name: M:ComponentPro.Net.Scp.UploadFiles(ComponentPro.IO.FileSystem,System.String,System.Object[],System.String,ComponentPro.IO.TransferOptions,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Uploads files from the specified source directory on the specified source file system that match the search condition specified in the option parameter to the specified remote directory using multiple threads.
member.param: The source file system containing files to upload.

The path of the source directory on the source file system to upload files to this remote file system. If it's empty, the current directory path of the file system will be used. When the parameter is null reference, This can contains wild card masks. For example, "c:\mydir\*.dat;*.cs,*.vb" means all .dat, .cs, and .vb files in 'c:\mydir' will be uploaded, "c:\mydir" means all files in 'c:\mydir' will be uploaded. For more details, see and the option .
The list of filenames to upload, or null to transfer files in the that match the search condition specified in the option parameter.
The path of the remote directory to store uploaded files.
The transfer options object which provides many settings to control the file transfer process.
The number of threads used for the file transfer.

A boolean value indicating whether to wait for the completion of all threads. If this parameter is true, this method will block the caller process's execution until all threads have completed; otherwise, this method will immediately return the control to the caller process.
member.returns: A object that contains transfer statictics and a list of processed files and directories.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.Scp.RemoteEndPoint

member.param: The path of the remote directory containing files and subdirectories to download. If it's empty, the current directory path of the file system will be used. When the parameter is null reference, this can contains wild card masks. For example, "/myremotedir/*.dat;*.cs,*.vb" means all .dat, .cs, and .vb files in '/myremotedir' will be downloaded, "/myremotedir" means all files in '/myremotedir' will be downloaded. For more details, see and the option .
The list of objects containing information of files to download, or null to transfer files in the that match the search condition specified in the option parameter.
The path of the local directory on the disk file system to receive files from this remote file system.
The transfer options object which provides many settings to control the file transfer process.
member.returns: An object that references the asynchronous operation.

The current working folder can be retrieved via the method.

member.summary: Gets or sets the network proxy to use to access a remote server.
member.value: The to use to access a remote server.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.Sftp.Encoding
member.summary: Gets or sets the Encoding to use to encode and decode command parameters and server responses.
member.value: The Encoding to use to encode and decode command parameters and server responses. Default is Encoding.Default.
member.remarks: Even though the RFC implies that UTF-8 is to be used to encode all communication, the practice is very different, unfortunately. In the real world, all SFTP servers seem to default to the OS default charset.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.Sftp.TransferType
member.summary: Gets or sets the data transfer mode.
member.remarks: It is highly recommended to set the property to the target OS first.
member.value: The file transfer mode. Default is Binary.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.Sftp.ServerOs
member.summary: Gets or sets the server type.
member.value: The server type. Default is Unknown.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.Sftp.Config
member.summary: Gets or sets SFTP object settings.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.Sftp.MaxDownloadSpeed
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum allowed download speed, in kilobytes. For unlimited speed, set this to zero.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.Sftp.MaxUploadSpeed
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum allowed upload speed, in kilobytes. For unlimited speed, set this to zero.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.Sftp.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets a value, in milliseconds, indicating after what period of time an SFTP operation (sending commands, waiting for responses or time between data buffer transfers) should timeout. Specify -1 or 0 to indicate that the request does not time out.
member.remarks: By default, this property is set to 60000 (60 seconds). Minimal value is 1000. A value of -1 or 0 indicates that the request does not timeout.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.Sftp.ProtocolVersion
member.summary: Gets the SFTP protocol version used by this session. This information is only available on fully initialized and authenticated sessions.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.Sftp.State
member.summary: Gets the current state of the object.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.Sftp.LocalEndPoint
member.summary: Gets the local client .
member.value: The that the component is using for communications.
member.remarks: The property gets an that contains the local IP address and port number to which your Socket is bound. You must cast this to an before retrieving any information. You can then call the property to retrieve the local , and the property to retrieve the local port number.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.Sftp.RemoteEndPoint
member.summary: Gets the remote server .
member.value: The with which the Socket is communicating.
member.remarks: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, the property gets the that contains the remote IP address and port number to which the Socket is connected. If you are using a connectionless protocol, RemoteEndPoint contains the default remote IP address and port number with which the Socket will communicate. You must cast this to an before retrieving any information. You can then call the property to retrieve the remote , and the property to retrieve the remote port number.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.SftpConfig.AutomaticFileTypeClassification
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether to automatically classify the files with name that matches one of the ASCII file search conditions as ASCII files.
member.remarks: When the property is Auto the component will use ASCII transfer type for ASCII files.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.SftpConfig.AsciiFileSearchConditions
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of ASCII search conditions.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.SftpConfig.DontGetFileInfoBeforeTransferring
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether to disable getting information of the source file before transferring. Default value is false, always gets information of the source file to transfer.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.SftpConfig.CheckDirectoryPathOnCreation
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether to check directory path on creation. Default value is false.
member.remarks: If enabled the component checks if the parent folders of the directory to be created exist or not, if not they will be created.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.SftpConfig.EnableSftp4
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean flag indicating whether to enable SFTP version 4 features.
member.remarks: This property should be set before connecting to the SFTP server.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.SftpConfig.UploadBlocks
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of concurrent upload blocks. Use this and the property properly will speed up the upload.
member.value: The number of concurrent upload threads.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.SftpConfig.UploadBlockSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the upload buffer size. Use this and the property properly will speed up uploading files.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.SftpConfig.DownloadBlocks
member.summary: Gets or sets the concurrent download blocks. Use this and the property properly will speed up downloading files.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.SftpConfig.DownloadBlockSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the download buffer size.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.SftpConfig.HighSpeedNetworkOptimization
member.summary: Indicates whether to enable features for high-speed network connection. This may improve the transfer speed.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.SftpConfig.WaitForServerWelcomeMessage
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether to wait for server SSH protocol welcome message before sending the client one.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.SftpConfig.PasswordAuthenticationFirst
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether to try password authentication first when using both password and private key authentication method. Default value is false - try the private key first.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.Net.SftpConfig.UseReadWriteModeForDownloads
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to open file for downloading in read-write mode instead of read-only mode. Default value is false.
